chinese: 以指挥；进行；传导（电、热等）；表现加，行为，举止；指挥，带领
他正指挥着一支交响乐团。
平民，百姓ad）.平民的，百姓的，民用的
世界和平是所有老百姓都想要的。
english: World peace is what all the civilians want

chinese: 1织布机 Y.阴森地逼近；隐现；即将
这个女孩正在用织布机织布。
english: The girl is operating the loom to weave the cloth

chinese: VE.抑制；镇压
他抑制住了冲动，没对弄坏他模型的表弟大吼大叫。
english: He repressed the urge to shout at his cousin who broke his model

chinese: ad）.粗暴的，无礼的
他无礼的行为触怒了电影院里的每个人。
english: His outrageous behavior annoyed everyone in the movie theater

chinese: n.租住的房间；寄宿，借宿；（大学生的）校外宿舍
你可以在这个网站上找到各种各样的出租房间。
english: You can find all kinds of lodgings available on this website

chinese: n.铝
铝制饮料罐又轻又方便。
english: Aluminum drink cans are light and convenient

chinese: n.药物治疗
不推荐过度药物治疗。
english: Too much medication is not recommended

chinese: n. 翅膀v.飞行
妈妈，我想要那个有蝴蝶翅膀的洋娃娃！
english: Mommy, I want the doll with the butterfly wings!

chinese: v.脱衣服；剥去；夺去 n. 长条形土地
请脱掉你的衣服配合体检。
english: Please strip off your clothes for the medical exam

chinese: ad合算的；获利的；有利可图的
这些赚钱的投资让我获利颇丰。
english: I made a lot of money from my lucrative investments

chinese: adj.孤立的，分开的
这座漂亮的独栋宅院有红色的正门和车库。
english: This beautiful detached house has a... red front door and garage

chinese: n.激怒，苦恼
堵车让司机们很愤怒。
english: The big traffic jam brought great irritation to the drivers

chinese: m 方案，计划；阴谋，诡计 以图谋，
我们队下一场比赛的方案是使用442阵型。
english: Our scheme for the next game is a 4-4-2 formation

chinese: n.大屠杀，残杀 Y.彻底击败
在狐狸王当政时，没有兔子在那场大屠杀中幸
english: No rabbits survived the massacre under the authority of the fox king

chinese: 几.航空，航空学；飞机制造业
航空是我最大的爱好之——,我喜欢长机。
english: Aviation is one of my biggest interests, I love airplanes
